t: Amazon.com: Best Of Lyle Lovett Live: CDs & Vinyl
s: When it comes to Lyle's work---you just gotta Lovett. And this collection is as good as it gets. I must admit I bought it for one song "If I Had a Boat" which by itself was worth the price of the CD. What I got was all those other great tunes for FREE!! What a deal.
